data.eml:eml: Nidirana chapaensis (Bourret, 1937), one additional anuran species for the amphibian fauna of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yuan, Zhiyong, Liu, Xiaolong, Wang, Kai, Wang, Jian, Chen, Jinmin, Jin, Jieqiong, Wei, Pingfan, Zhou, Jiajun, Che, Jing (2019): Nidirana chapaensis (Bourret, 1937), one additional anuran species for the amphibian fauna of China. Zootaxa 4571 (4): 580-588, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.4.10
